<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.001.001.02"> <pain.001.001.02>
<GrpHdr> <MsgId>${str(localcontext.get('export_file_id', 0)).zfill(6)}</MsgId> <CreDtTm>${datetime.datetime.now().isoformat()}</CreDtTm> <NbOfTxs>${sum([len(order.line_ids) for order in object])}</NbOfTxs> <CtrlSum>${sum([line.amount for order in object for line in order.line_ids])}</CtrlSum> <Grpg>MIXD</Grpg> <InitgPty> <Nm>Credit Transfer</Nm> </InitgPty> </GrpHdr>

<PmtInf> <PmtInfId>${object.reference}</PmtInfId> <PmtMtd>TRF</PmtMtd> <PmtTpInf> <SvcLvl> <Cd>SEPA</Cd> </SvcLvl> </PmtTpInf> <ReqdExctnDt>${time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}</ReqdExctnDt> <Dbtr> <Nm>{object.mode.company_id.name}</Nm> </Dbtr> <DbtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>{object.mode.bank_id.iban}</IBAN> </Id> </DbtrAcct> <DbtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>{object.mode.bank_id.bank.bic}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </DbtrAgt> % for line in object.line_ids: <CdtTrfTxInf> <PmtId> <InstrId>{line.name}</InstrId> <EndToEndId>{line.id}</EndToEndId> </PmtId> <Amt> <InstdAmt Ccy="${object.mode.company_id.currency_id.symbol or 'EUR'}">${line.amount}</InstdAmt> </Amt> <CdtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${line.bank_id.bank.bic}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </CdtrAgt> <Cdtr> <Nm>{line.partner_id.name}</Nm> </Cdtr> <CdtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>{line.bank_id.iban}</IBAN> </Id> </CdtrAcct> <RmtInf> <Ustrd>${lie.ml_inv_ref and 'Invoice %s' % line.ml_inv_ref.reference or 'Payment from %s' % object.mode.company_id.name}</Ustrd> </RmtInf> </CdtTrfTxInf> % endfor </PmtInf>
